A step to the Bath with a character of the place. Ward, Edward, 1667-1731.
16 p.
Printed and sold by J. How ..., London : 1700.
Attributed to Ward by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints. Advertisement: verso of t.p. Imperfect: stained. Reproduction of original in the Bristol Public Library.
